watchInterval.title: Watch Interval
watchInterval.description: How often to check for changes. Must be written in milliseconds.

path.title: Path
path.description: The path to the folder to watch.

type.title: Type
type.description:
The type of file to check for.

Options: file, folder, any

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: The pattern to check for changes. Must be written in Regular Expression with backslash escaped.

action.title: Action
action.description:
The action to take when the condition is met.

Options: move, delete

destination.title: Destination
destination.description:
The destination to move or copy the file to.
If action is delete, this is ignored.

renamePattern.title: Rename Pattern
renamePattern.description:
The pattern to rename the file to.
If this is not set, the file will not be renamed.
If action is delete, this is ignored.

searchValue.title: Search Value
searchValue.description: The value to search for. Must be written in Regular Expression with backslash escaped.

replaceValue.title: Replace Value
replaceValue.description: The value to replace the search value with. Must be written in Regular Expression with backslash escaped. You can use replace methods such as $1, $2, $3, etc.

noMatchedAction.title: No Matched Action
noMatchedAction.description:
The action to take when no conditions are met.

Options: none, move, delete

noMatchedDestination.title: No Matched Destination
noMatchedDestination.description: The destination to move or copy the file to. If noMatchedAction is none or delete, this is ignored.
